column.Name: StyleType
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleTypeID, StyleTypeDescription FROM pStyleType ORDER BY StyleTypeOrder

column.Name: StyleSet
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, CustomKey FROM xCustom9 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: StyleCategory
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleCategoryId, StyleCategory FROM pStyleCategory Where Active = 1 ORDER BY StyleCategory

column.Name: SizeRange
column.lookupquery: SELECT SizeRangeCode, SizeRangeCode AS SizeRangeCodeName FROM pSizeRange Where Active = 1 ORDER BY SizeRangeCode

column.Name: SizeClass
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom AS CustomName FROM pSizeClass Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: IntroSeasonYearID
column.lookupquery: SELECT SeasonYearID, SeasonYear FROM vwx_SeasonYear_SEL WHERE Active = 1

column.Name: CustomField3
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom AS CustomName FROM iCustom3 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField5
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom AS CustomName FROM xCustom1 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: WashType
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom AS CustomName FROM iCustom14 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField8
column.lookupquery: SELECT * FROM xCustom5 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: Designer
column.lookupquery: SELECT Firstname +' ' +Lastname as name, Firstname +' ' + Lastname as fullname from users Where TradePartner = 0 order by firstname

column.Name: CustomField12
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom AS CustomKey, Custom FROM iCustom29 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField13
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom AS CustomKey, Custom FROM iCustom30 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey
